import React from 'react' import './Style/Card.css' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ShoppingCartIcon from '@material-ui/icons/AddShoppingCart'; import FavoriteBorderIcon from '@material-ui/icons/FavoriteBorder'; function Card({ title, imageUrl, body }) { return (

{title}

{body}

Click to show more

) } export default Card;
